text: Patriarch Dorotheus may refer to: * Dorotheus of Bulgaria, Patriarch of Bulgaria in 1300–c. 1315 * Four Greek Orthodox Patriarchs of Antioch, see the list of Greek Orthodox Patriarchs of Antioch * Dorotheus V Ibn Al-Ahmar, Melkite Patriarch of Antioch from 1604 to 1611
title: Patriarch Dorotheus
